alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Wilson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Edgecombe and southeastern Wilson Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wilson, or 14 miles west of Farmville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilson, Lucama, Stantonsburg, Black Creek, Macclesfield, Saratoga and Willbanks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
